author: Choo Han Teck J:
casename: Public Prosecutor v Low Ah Soy
counsel: James Lee (Deputy Public Prosecutor) for prosecution; Choo Si Sen and Jennifer Lim Lay Choo (Choo and Lim LLC) for accused
tags-parsed: Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Sentencing/Accused pleaded guilty to culpable homicide not amounting to murder and offence of causing mischief/Appropriate sentence.
